blogPost.excerpt: A different way to organize your To-Do List or view iOS Reminders. A better tasks widget for your homescreen. Prioritize your to-do list with the weekly monthly yearly tasks planner app. Now with optional Reminders Sync, homescreen widgets, and iCloud backup.
blogPost.body: A different way to organize your To-Do List or view iOS Reminders. A better tasks widget for your homescreen. Prioritize your to-do list with the weekly monthly yearly tasks planner app. Now with optional Reminders Sync, homescreen widgets, and iCloud backup.
blogPost.title: Strongweek - Organise your To-Do list & reminders
blogPost.author: Chris

localize.description: 另一种组织待办事项列表或查看IOS提醒的方式。为您的主屏幕提供更好的任务小部件。使用每周、每月、年度任务计划器应用程序确定待办事项的优先顺序。现在具有可选的提醒同步、主屏幕小工具和iCloud备份。
localize.tagline: 组织你的待办事项清单和提醒

localize.description: 另一種組織待辦事項列表或查看IOS提醒的方式。爲您的主屏幕提供更好的任務小部件。使用每週、每月、年度任務計劃器應用程序確定待辦事項的優先順序。現在具有可選的提醒同步、主屏幕小工具和iCloud備份。
localize.tagline: 組織你的待辦事項清單和提醒

previous.excerpt: DoYouNotes helps students memorize their notes faster. How? 1. upload a PDF file 2. mark the sections to study 3. review the sections (recall/show/hide content, spaced repetition, order by urgency/randomly, self-evaluate) 4. check your progress
previous.title: DoYouNotes - Memorize your notes faster

localize.description: DoYouNotes帮助学生更快地记忆笔记。如何上传？1.上传PDF文件2.标记要学习的部分3.复习各部分(回忆/显示/隐藏内容、间隔重复、按紧急程度/随机排序、自我评估)4.检查您的进度
DoYouNotes幫助學生更快地記憶筆記。如何上傳？1.上傳PDF文件2.標記要學習的部分3.複習各部分(回憶/顯示/隱藏內容、間隔重複、按緊急程度/隨機排序、自我評估)4.檢查您的進度

next.excerpt: Access your favourite Websites and Web Apps easily and quickly. Save the websites addresses and give them a custom name and icon, then easily access them from the Menu Bar or in an Always-on-Top window. Freely resize the menu window for a better experience
next.title: Surf - Access any website or web app from menu bar/floating window

localize.description: 轻松快速地访问您喜爱的网站和Web应用程序。保存网站地址并为其指定自定义名称和图标，然后从菜单栏或始终在顶部的窗口轻松访问它们。可自由调整菜单窗口的大小以获得更好的体验
localize.tagline: 从菜单栏/浮动窗口访问任何网站或Web应用程序

localize.description: 輕鬆快速地訪問您喜愛的網站和Web應用程序。保存網站地址併爲其指定自定義名稱和圖標，然後從菜單欄或始終在頂部的窗口輕鬆訪問它們。可自由調整菜單窗口的大小以獲得更好的體驗
localize.tagline: 從菜單欄/浮動窗口訪問任何網站或Web應用程序
